value.message:
feat: Add navigation toggle, smooth scrolling, and tabs functionality

- Implemented navigation toggle for mobile view.
- Added smooth scrolling with offset for fixed navbar.
- Created tabs functionality with keyboard navigation support.
- Integrated clipboard functionality for code blocks.
- Enhanced navbar with scroll effect and active link highlighting.
- Added Intersection Observer for animations on scroll.
- Preloaded images for better performance.
- Included loading indicator for async operations.
- Established a responsive design for various screen sizes.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: chore: add copy-webpack-plugin as a dev dependency
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Enhance build system and UI for Slurper Demo

Updated README.md to improve presentation with emojis, a "Quick Start" guide, and highlighted new features like a detective theme and gamification. Integrated npm into SlurperDemo.Web.csproj for build automation, including npm package installation and build tasks. Modified _Layout.cshtml to bundle CSS and JS via webpack, improving performance. Removed achievement counter script from _Layout.cshtml, likely integrated into new gamification features.

Enhanced site.css with responsive design utilities, Font Awesome 7 integration, animations, and effects for improved interactivity. Updated site.js with new classes for achievement tracking, data table enhancements, form validation, smooth scrolling, toast notifications, and loading spinner utilities. Added vendor.js for third-party libraries and site.scss for SCSS features. Introduced build documentation, PowerShell script, and configuration files for a modern npm-based build system.
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: Update achievement icon for Format Explorer
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Upgrade to .NET 10.0

Updated WebSpark.Slurper to multi-target net8.0;net9.0;net10.0

Updated SlurperDemo.Web to target net10.0

Updated WebSpark.Slurper.Tests to target net10.0

Upgraded 6 Microsoft.Extensions.* packages to 10.0.0

Upgraded System.Text.Json to 10.0.0

All tests passing: 96/99 passed, 3 intentionally skipped
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message: Pre-upgrade commit: Save current state before .NET 10 upgrade
value.author: Mark Hazleton

value.message:
Refactor Slurper for DI, HttpClient, and Validation

Upgraded dependencies for compatibility, including `Microsoft.NET.Test.Sdk` (17.14.1 → 18.0.0) and `xunit.runner.visualstudio` (3.1.1 → 3.1.5). Added `Microsoft.Extensions.Http` for HTTP client support.

Introduced `HttpClientService` with retry logic, exponential backoff, and lifecycle management. Replaced static `HttpClient` in `JsonExtractor` with dependency-injected `IHttpClientService` for better testability and maintainability.

Refactored `JsonSlurper` for modularity, added depth validation, and improved handling of JSON structures. Centralized input validation with the new `InputValidator` utility for file paths, URLs, and source content.

Enhanced `SlurperFactory` to support `IHttpClientService` injection. Updated `ServiceCollectionExtensions` to register `HttpClientService` and related dependencies.

Improved retry logic for HTTP requests and streamlined large file handling. Refactored methods for better readability and modularity. Updated test projects to align with these changes.

Maintained backward compatibility with fallback logic for `HttpClient` and existing property structures.
value.author: Mark Hazleton
